description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry Lemonade recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lemonade,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Strawberry,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Strawberry Lemonade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place strawberries in a blender and blend until smooth. Strain into a large jug. Discard pulp. Add lemon juice and sugar, and stir to dissolve sugar. Stir in mineral water. Serve over ice with strawberry and lemon.
